title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
description: She was a schoolmistress with a difference. Proud, cultured, romantic, her ideas were progressive, even shocking. And when she decided to transform a group of young girls under her tutelage into the "creme de la creme" of Marcia Blaine school, no one could have predicted the outcome.This P.S. Edition contains insights, interviews and more.Alternate Cover Edition can be found here.
author: Muriel Spark
